name: 12-shadow-divtober-2022
title: 12. Shadow - Divtober 2022
description: This entry was an attempt to refine a few things I've learned along the way this #divtober month:  blur, repeat-linear-gradient, perspective and color animation. There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/8Ps5XXnb1x4
